name: Egg (bennettgsewell, banditbat)
description:
Objective:

Carry your egg to the stairs at the end of the level. You'll need to open locked doors with keys. Don't let the Jellies carry your egg away!!!

How to Play:

  • Return/Enter: START
  • Z: (B) button - Attack
  • X: (A) button - opens doors and pickup/drop items.
  • Arrow Keys to move

(Level 2+ appear broken currently :( Sorry!)

Future updates: HP pickups, weapon upgrades + points system, enemy knockback from attacks, enemies can open doors, fix broken levels.

Credits:

  • Programming: Bennett Sewell
  • Music + SFX, Sprites, Level Design: Tyler "BanditBat" Hooper
  • Start + Game Over Screen Art: Rachel Fussell
